# Specification Template for HistTUI Features

## Purpose
This template guides AI agents in creating proper specifications before writing code for HistTUI.

## Required Sections

### 1. Feature Overview
**What:** Clear description of what's being built
**Why:** User value and business justification
**Who:** Target users (developers, contributors, AI agents)

### 2. Technical Context
**Current State:** What exists today
**Proposed Changes:** What will change
**Dependencies:** Required packages, services, or features
**Impact Areas:** Which files/modules will be modified

### 3. Design Decisions
**Architecture:** How this fits into existing layers
**Data Storage:** Where/how data persists
**UI/UX:** Component structure and interaction patterns
**API Design:** Interfaces, types, and contracts

### 4. Implementation Plan
**Step 1:** [Description]
- Files to create: []
- Files to modify: []
- Risk level: Low/Medium/High

**Step 2:** [Description]
- Files to create: []
- Files to modify: []
- Risk level: Low/Medium/High

[Continue for all steps...]

### 5. Style Guide Compliance
- [ ] TypeScript strict mode enabled
- [ ] React/Ink patterns followed
- [ ] Material Design 3 colors used
- [ ] Keyboard-first navigation
- [ ] Error handling implemented
- [ ] Dual-audience documentation

### 6. Testing Strategy
**Unit Tests:** What needs testing
**Integration Tests:** How features work together
**Manual Testing:** Steps to verify functionality

### 7. Documentation Requirements
- [ ] Update README.md with feature section
- [ ] Create dedicated guide if complex (>500 lines code)
- [ ] Update ARCHITECTURE.md if layers change
- [ ] Add keyboard shortcuts documentation
- [ ] Include AI automation instructions in collapsible sections

### 8. Review Checklist
- [ ] Spec reviewed by maintainer
- [ ] All questions resolved
- [ ] Breaking changes identified
- [ ] Migration path defined (if needed)
- [ ] Rollback plan exists

## Approval Required Before Coding
**Reviewer:** @shelbeely or designated maintainer
**Status:** Draft / Under Review / Approved / Changes Requested
**Date:** YYYY-MM-DD
